H0.text: To kill prey is the purpose of snakes' venomous bites.

H1.text: Snakes use venomous bites to clean themselves.

H2.text: To kill rival snakes is why snakes have venomous bites.

H3.text: To scare humans is why snakes have venomous bites.

A4.text: Snake venom is a highly toxic saliva containing zootoxins that facilitates in the immobilization and digestion of prey.
